section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO.
explanation: While not explicitly contradictory, the agreement lacks clarity regarding the chosen business name "BM&V2GO." The agreement doesn't explicitly state what "BM&V2GO" stands for or how it relates to the member's names, potentially leading to confusion or misinterpretation. A clearer explanation would avoid later disputes. The Background section states the members agreed to jointly invest and setup a joint venture enterprise. If the name doesn't reflect that, it could be deemed a discrepancy.

section: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: This statement is vague and creates a potential contradiction with other sections of the agreement. While the Managers are appointed to manage the Venture (Section 7), the Members are the ultimate decision-makers. Giving the Managers sole discretion to determine the Purpose of the Venture undermines the Members' control and could lead to disagreements about the direction of the business. Section 10 states Within the limits of the Purpose of the Venture and the terms of this Agreement, the Managers, acting jointly, will have full authority to bind the Members in all matters relating to the direction, control and management of the Venture. Conduct and actions of the Managers will be dictated by policy and procedure established by the Members.

section:
Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"):
Member Contribution Description Agreed Value
BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD
JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: There is a significant contradiction in the stated values of the Capital Contributions. While JVLS, LLC is listed with a total agreed value of $3,500,000.00 USD, it is very unclear if BorrowMoney.com is contributing anything, since it states "To be determined USD". If BorrowMoney.com is not contributing capital, this makes the agreement unbalanced and potentially unenforceable.
